revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Adaptec |model=AWN-8060 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=10/2002 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |manuf=BroMax |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=O6M-WA301 |ic_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand= |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand= |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=Adaptec |default_ssid_regex=^Adaptec$ |default_ip= |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} [http://www.adaptec.com/en-us/support/_eol/wireless_prod/awn-8060/ Support page] :[http://download.adaptec.com/pdfs/user_guides/awn_8060_ug.pdf User's Guide]
The FCC ID for this device is not valid.. but assuming the device is indeed a WA301, the proper FCC ID is likely to be O6M-WA304-UF (which covers the WA301-UF and WA304-UF). :The WA30x-UF are '''Ubicom''' IP2022 based with an '''Intersil''' PRISM 3 PCMCIA wireless module.
OUIs may be a mix of 00:00:D1 ('''Adaptec''') and 00:02:DD ('''BroMax''')
The default SSID is presumed to be '''Adaptec''' (it is the value specified in the manual).
==Images== <gallery> File:Adaptec AWN-8060.jpg </gallery>[[Has images::external| ]]
